## Source: amazon-inspector (96f411f3e2786cc80d5d85bf7feb0c72705b6e5c95af9c002b0f716e0b15ea83)
The package revenuecat-mcp-extension was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (f2fe5e1bdb9f7b14ace23a731732dc245ee759d3628d236e0e6417218e979d4c)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'revenuecat-mcp-extension' @ 1.999.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
